name: No Signals Indeed
description: This is a GDA game jam entry and about 22 hours are left of deadline.I know and apologize my gamers that this game has very some functionality by the way it is my first game jam entry I hope you all like it.There will be some bugs in it I will overcome that in my free time. This is simple game in which you click the signals emitted devices in order to  defuse them.I wish you good luck
